import{isObject}from'lodash';import{toolnameC}from'../../pages/annotationConfig/formConfig/constants';export function checkNumber(v){var reg=/^[1-9]\d*$/g;if(reg.test(v)){return true;}return false;}export function formatDate(date,fmt){if(/(y+)/.test(fmt)){fmt=fmt.replace(RegExp.$1,(date.getFullYear()+'').substr(4-RegExp.$1.length));}var o={'M+':date.getMonth()+1,'d+':date.getDate(),'h+':date.getHours(),'m+':date.getMinutes(),'s+':date.getSeconds()};for(var k in o){// @ts-ignore
var str=o[k]+'';if(new RegExp("(".concat(k,")")).test(fmt)){fmt=fmt.replace(RegExp.$1,RegExp.$1.length===1?str:padLeftZero(str));}}return fmt;}function padLeftZero(str){return('00'+str).substr(str.length);}export function getCreateProjectCmt(showBase,Base,Step){return showBase?Base:Step;}export var jsonParser=function jsonParser(content){var defaultValue=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:{};try{if(typeof content==='string'){return JSON.parse(content);}else{return isObject(content)?content:defaultValue;}}catch(e){return defaultValue;}};/**
 * 复制文本
 * @param text
 * @param element
 */export var copyText=function copyText(text){var element=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:'input';var copyInput=document.createElement(element);copyInput.setAttribute('style',"\n      display: 'none'\n    ");document.body.appendChild(copyInput);copyInput.value=text;copyInput.select();document.execCommand('copy');document.body.removeChild(copyInput);};/**
 * 截取文件名
 * @param path - 文件路径
 */export var getBaseName=function getBaseName(path){var separator=/^Win/.test(navigator.platform)?'\\':'/';var splitPath=path.split(separator);return splitPath[splitPath.length-1];};export var validateTools=function validateTools(tools){if(tools&&tools.length>0){for(var i=0;i<tools.length;i++){if(Object.keys(toolnameC).indexOf(tools[i].tool)<0){return false;}}}else{return false;}return true;};
